articles.author: Kaan Ozcan
articles.title: As Norovirus cases rise, here’s what to know about this year’s spread — and how to protect yourself - NBC News
articles.description: Norovirus has been rising in the U.S. since as early as mid-October, especially in states like Louisiana, Michigan and Indiana, according to data from WastewaterSCAN.
articles.content:
A nasty, highly contagious virus is spreading across the country ahead of the holiday season and its not the flu or Covid.
Norovirus, also called the winter vomiting disease, has been rising across … [+5427 chars]
